body_html:
See how ResNets are implemented in official packages: https://github.com/pytorch/vision/blob/master/torchvision/models/resnet.py#L39-L51

We dont need an identity function to actually use the input / have a no-op on input, just return the input as-is.
body_text:
See how ResNets are implemented in official packages: https://github.com/pytorch/vision/blob/master/torchvision/models/resnet.py#L39-L51
We dont need an identity function to actually use the input / have a no-op on input, just return the input as-is.
body:
See how ResNets are implemented in official packages: https://github.com/pytorch/vision/blob/master/torchvision/models/resnet.py#L39-L51

We dont need an `identity` function to actually use the input / have a no-op on input, just return the input as-is.
